title: Is Wavy Hair Attractive on Guys?

steps.title: Yes, people do find wavy hair attractive on guys.
steps.content: Yes, people do find wavy hair attractive on guys. Wavy hair is all the rage these days and can look great at just about any length. What's not to love with its tossable nature, simple curl, and volume? Those gorgeous locks are sure to capture your crush’s attention, so flip that hair! Hairstyles are a matter of preference, and some people might like straight hair better—but don’t sweat it! What matters most is if you like your hair.

steps.title: Get a haircut that suits your face shape.
steps.content: Get a haircut that suits your face shape. Sometimes all your wavy hair needs is a little pick-me-up to look fantastic. Asking the barber for a cut that matches your facial structure is a great start, as this will accentuate your handsome features. Check out these common haircuts for each face shape: [1] X Research source Square: A faded undercut with top layers emphasizes short waves Round: 5 to 6 inches (13 to 15 cm) on top with a clean fade gives a tousled look Oval: A fade with sharp details adds definition to the top Heart: Side-swept bangs emphasize the natural curve of waves Oblong: 4 to 5 inches (10 to 13 cm) of length lets waves fall naturally Diamond: A soft scissor cut adds volume and layers

steps.title: Make sure your hair is clean.
steps.content: Make sure your hair is clean. Grooming and taking care of yourself is an instant attractiveness booster. [2] X Research source When your hair looks or feels greasy, hop in the shower and wash those locks with a nice smelling shampoo and conditioner . Opt for washing your hair two or three days out of the week rather than every day. [3] X Research source Washing your hair every day can strip it of its natural oils, making your locks get oiler faster. If you need a midweek pick-me-up, try a dry shampoo as it can help put life back into your hair the day before a wash.

steps.title: Keep your hair healthy by caring for it.
steps.content: Keep your hair healthy by caring for it. The last thing a crush or partner wants is to be running their hands through dry and damaged hair. Take care of your golden locks by following these tips and tricks: [4] X Research source Use products designed for your hair type and needs Try a leave-in conditioner for smooth, defined waves Deep condition with a deep conditioner treatment once a week to moisturize Comb wet hair with a detangling brush or wide-tooth comb Establish a hair care routine that works for your schedule

steps.title: Push your hair back with gel or hairspray.
steps.content: Push your hair back with gel or hairspray. Your locks are naturally gorgeous, so embrace them! Rub some styling gel , mousse , or spray between your palms, and run your fingers through your hair. This will create a sexy, tousled look. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Spray your hair with sea salt.
steps.content: Spray your hair with sea salt. Sea salt spray adds volume and texture that’s totally swoon-worthy. Simply spritz longer hair with some product and comb it back with your hands. [6] X Research source You can even use sea salt spray as a more natural alternative to hairspray.

steps.title: Part your hair down the middle.
steps.content: Part your hair down the middle. Styling hair with a middle part is super trendy and gives off an innocent vibe. Plus, the style emphasizes the natural curve of your waves. If you have long layers or curtain bangs, all the style takes is a comb and some brushing. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Taper the sides and fluff the top.
steps.content: Taper the sides and fluff the top. A faded side with a choppy layered top adds edge and pairs nicely with a short beard. Simply keep the hair around your ears military short and tousle the top with gel or hairspray .

steps.title: Pull your hair over to one side.
steps.content: Pull your hair over to one side. If you have longer hair or bangs, use a brush or your fingertips to move it up and over to one side. This will accentuate your jawline and give fluidity to those sexy waves.

steps.title: Keep your hair long and messy.
steps.content: Keep your hair long and messy. Everyone will be swooning over you and this sexy look, and all you have to do is roll out of bed! Run your fingers through your hair, opting for a hair oil if your waves get frizzy. This style works best with chin and shoulder-length hair. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Hold your curls back in a messy bun.
steps.content: Hold your curls back in a messy bun. Who doesn’t fall head-over-heels for a man bun? Pull those luscious locks out of your face if you’re going to the gym, doing hard work, or simply not wanting to deal with it. Believe us; it’ll look perfect. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Layer the top and fade the sides.
steps.content: Layer the top and fade the sides. Ask your stylist for 2 inches (5.1 cm) layers and a sharp mid fade to get an outrageously edgy and sexy look. All you’ll need to do is roll out of bed, run some gel through your hair, and walk out the door.

steps.title: Try changing up your hairdo if your crush doesn’t like wavy hair.
steps.content: Try changing up your hairdo if your crush doesn’t like wavy hair. Style your hair differently by parting your hair in the opposite direction or gelling it back in a way you haven’t before. Don’t be afraid to try something new. You may just find a look you adore! Confidence is key, and you should only switch things up if you want to. If anyone pressures you into changing your appearances, it may be time to move on . Remember, beauty is in the eye of the beholder, and everyone has a “type” or “standard.” [10] X Research source Chances are, if someone doesn’t like your hair, you’ll meet someone who does soon enough.
